languages.text: "К сожалению, сейчас вы не сможете покинуть столицу и отправиться на его поиски. Повстанцы завладели неким старинным орудием и сделали невозможными полеты над городом".
"Unfortunately, right now you won't be able to leave the capital and set out to look for him. The rebels have got hold of some ancient weapon and made flying over the city impossible."
languages.original_text: "К сожалению, сейчас вы не сможете покинуть столицу и отправиться на его поиски. Повстанцы завладели неким старинным орудием и сделали невозможными полеты над городом".

traits.locale_text: "Unfortunately, right now you won't be able to leave the capital and set out to look for him. The rebels have got hold of some antique weapon and made flying over the city impossible."
"Unfortunately, right now you won't be able to leave the capital and set out to look for him. The rebels have got hold of some antique weapon and made flying over the city impossible."
"Unfortunately, right now you won't be able to leave the capital and set out to look for him. The rebels have gotten hold of some ancient weapon and made flying over the city impossible."
"Unfortunately, right now you won't be able to leave the capital and set out to look for him. The rebels have gotten hold of some ancient weapon and made flying over the city impossible."
"Unfortunately, right now you won't be able to leave the capital and set out to look for him. The rebels have got hold of some ancient weapon and made flying over the city impossible."
"Unfortunately, right now you won't be able to leave the capital and set out to look for him. The rebels have got hold of some ancient weapon and made flying over the city impossible."

languages.text: "Leider könnt Ihr die Hauptstadt im Moment nicht verlassen, um nach ihm zu suchen. Die Rebellen haben irgendeine uralte Waffe in die Finger bekommen und machen das Fliegen über der Stadt unmöglich."
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, right now you won't be able to leave the capital and set out to look for him. The rebels have got hold of some ancient weapon and made flying over the city impossible."

traits.locale_text: "Leider könnt Ihr die Hauptstadt im Moment nicht verlassen, um nach ihm zu suchen. Die Rebellen haben irgendeine uralte Waffe in die Finger bekommen und machen das Fliegen über der Stadt unmöglich."

languages.text: « Malheureusement, vous ne pouvez pas quitter la capitale afin de partir à sa recherche pour l'instant. Les rebelles se sont emparés d'une arme ancienne qui rend le survol de la cité impossible. »
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, right now you won't be able to leave the capital and set out to look for him. The rebels have got hold of some ancient weapon and made flying over the city impossible."

traits.locale_text: « Malheureusement, vous ne pouvez pas quitter la capitale afin de partir à sa recherche pour l'instant. Les rebelles se sont emparés d'une arme ancienne qui rend le survol de la cité impossible. »

languages.text: “遗憾的是，您目前无法离开首都，前往那片地区。叛军弄到了某件古老的武器，我们的飞船目前无法在这座城市上空飞行。”
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, right now you won't be able to leave the capital and set out to look for him. The rebels have got hold of some ancient weapon and made flying over the city impossible."

traits.locale_text: “遗憾的是，您目前无法离开首都，前往那片地区。叛军弄到了某件古老的武器，我们的飞船目前无法在这座城市上空飞行。”

languages.text: 「残念ながら、今は首都を離れてその方を探しに行くことはできない。反乱者が古の兵器を手に入れたので、首都上空を飛ぶことができないのだ」
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, right now you won't be able to leave the capital and set out to look for him. The rebels have got hold of some ancient weapon and made flying over the city impossible."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら、今は首都を離れてその方を探しに行くことはできない。反乱者が古の兵器を手に入れたので、首都上空を飛ぶことができないのだ」

languages.text: «Por desgracia, ahora mismo no podrá salir de la capital y buscarlo. Los rebeldes se han hecho con un arma antigua y han hecho imposible sobrevolar la ciudad».
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, right now you won't be able to leave the capital and set out to look for him. The rebels have got hold of some ancient weapon and made flying over the city impossible."

traits.locale_text: «Por desgracia, ahora mismo no podrá salir de la capital y buscarlo. Los rebeldes se han hecho con un arma antigua y han hecho imposible sobrevolar la ciudad».

languages.text: "Ne yazık ki şu an başkentten ayrılıp onu aramaya çıkmanız mümkün değil. İsyancılar, kadim bir silahı ele geçirerek şehrin üzerinde uçmayı imkânsız hâle getirdi."
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, right now you won't be able to leave the capital and set out to look for him. The rebels have got hold of some ancient weapon and made flying over the city impossible."

traits.locale_text: "Ne yazık ki şu an başkentten ayrılıp onu aramaya çıkmanız mümkün değil. İsyancılar, kadim bir silahı ele geçirerek şehrin üzerinde uçmayı imkânsız hâle getirdi."
